Size of this PNG preview of this SVG file: 800 × 480 pixels. Other resolutions: 320 × 192 pixels | 1,024 × 614 pixels | 1,280 × 768 pixels | 2,560 × 1,536 pixels.
Original file (SVG file, nominally 1,000 × 600 pixels, file size: 221 bytes)
This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.
Summary
DescriptionFlag of Scotland.svg
Ænglisc: Fana Scotlandes
Brezhoneg : Banniel Bro-Skos
Čeština: Skotská vlajka
Cymraeg: Baner yr Alban
Dansk: Skotlands flag
Deutsch: Flagge Schottlands
Eesti: Šotimaa lipp
English: Flag of Scotland. Ratio 3:5. The blue used is "royal" blue (Pantone 300), following the Scottish Parliament's recommendation of 2003. See also the traditional colour: Flag of Scotland (traditional).svg: .
Español: Bandera de Escocia
Esperanto: Flago de Skotio
Français : Drapeau de l'Écosse
Gaeilge: Bratach na hAlban
Gaelg: Brattagh ny h-Albey
Gàidhlig: Bratach na h-Alba
Hrvatski: Zastava Škotske
Italiano: Bandiera della Scozia
Kernowek: Baner Alban
Latina: Vexillium Scotiae
Latviešu: Skotijas karogs
Lietuvių: Škotijos vėliava
Magyar: Skócia zászlaja
Malti: Il-bandiera ta 'l-Iskozja
Nederlands: Vlag van Schotland
Nouormand : Couleu de l'Êcosse
Polski: Flaga Szkocji
Português: Bandeira da Escócia
Română: Drapelul Scoţiei
Scots: Banner o Scotland
Slovenčina: Vlajka Škótska
Slovenščina: Zastava Škotske
Suomi: Skotlannin lippu
Svenska: Skottlands flagga
Türkçe: İskoçya bayrağı
Ελληνικά: Σημαία της Σκωτίας
Български: Знаме на Шотландия
Македонски: Знаме на Шкотска
Русский: Флаг Шотландии
Українська: Прапор Шотландії
日本語： スコットランドの国旗
العربية : علم اسكتلندا
فارسی : پرچم اسکاتلند
Date
16th century
date QS:P,+1550-00-00T00:00:00Z/7 (adopted by the Government of Scotland in 2003)
Source
http://kbolino.freeshell.org/svg/scotland.svg
Author
none known

SVG development
InfoField
It is easy to put a border around this flag image:
[[File:Flag of Scotland.svg|border|80px]]
White rendered as RGB 255 255 255
Blue rendered as RGB 000 094 184Pantone 300 C
The SVG code is valid.
This flag was created with a text editor.
Licensing
Public domainPublic domainfalsefalse
This work is ineligible for copyright and therefore in the public domain because it consists entirely of information that is common property and contains no original authorship.
This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.
